answers.answer: Let your Dr. Know. Swelling can be normal but when it gets two to three times bigger you should be concerned get it under control early
It happened to me too but I was pregnant in the summer. Pretty much they lectured me about salt intake and checked for preeclampsia every visit but no other symptoms. I just retained a lot of water.
Thanks I'll talk to them tomorrow (:

question: So recently I had some normal swelling in my hands and feet but today my feet and lower legs are two times the size they normally are and are so big that they feel like they are going to explode  and my hands are so swollen I can barley bend my fingers ! It hurts .  Is this normal ?  I tried taking a bath but I don't think that it helped me much . I havea ddoctors appointment tomorrow at 3:30 . . .I am 37 weeks today
title: Swelling
